quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: There are few reasons for telling the truth, but for lying the number is infinite.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: The future is the worst thing about the present.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Big people don't make people feel small.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Believe nothing you hear, and only one half that you see.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
author: William Faulkner

quote: By words the mind is winged.
author: Aristophanes

quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace.
author: Dogen

quote: All religions, arts and sciences are branches of the same tree.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Nothing good ever comes of violence.
author: Martin Luther

quote: You're always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
author: Richard Bach

quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
author: James Allen

quote: A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of his opportunities and an optimist is one who makes opportunities of his difficulties.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: Do something worth remembering.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: If you pray for rain, be prepared to deal with some mud.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: Rest in reason; move in passion.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: You can do two things at once, but you can't focus effectively on two things at once.
author: Gary Keller

quote: Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Life's too mysterious to take too serious.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
author: James Matthew Barrie

quote: At every moment where language can't go, that's your mind.
author: Bodhidharma

quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.
author: Betty White

quote: Failure is feedback. Learn from it and move on.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
author: Euripides
